## Shiny apps

```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
# ---- packages ----
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)

apps <- tribble(
  ~slug,          ~title,              ~description,
  "varasjodur_tillaga_utfaersla",   "Styrkjakerfi VR - Reiknivél",   "Reiknivél fyrir nýja hugmynd að styrkjakerfi VR",
  "varasjodur_utfaersla","FVSA kerfið fyrir VR",   "Reiknivél sem heimfærir styrkjakerfi FVSA yfir á VR"
)

cat("<div class=\"row\">\n")
pwalk(apps, \(slug, title, description) {
  cat(glue(
'<div class="col-md-4 mb-4">
<div class="card h-100 shadow-sm">
<div class="card-body d-flex flex-column">
<h5 class="card-title">{title}</h5>
<p class="card-text flex-grow-1">{description}</p>
<a class="btn btn-primary mt-auto" target="_blank"
   href=" https://vrstettarfelag.shinyapps.io/{slug}/">Open app &raquo;</a>
</div></div></div>\n'))
})
cat("</div>")
```
